flawed_nl_solution:
Josiah is 15 x 3 = <<15*3=45>>45 years old now.
In three years, Josiah will be 45 + 3 = <<45+3=48>>48 years old.
Hans will be 15 + 3 = <<15+3=19>>19 years old in three years.
So, the sum of their ages in three years is 48 + 19 = <<48+19=67>>67 years old.
#### 67

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 19. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
